verbose_text: In fact, we have recently found that transduction of the MF4 fusion product into leukemic cells, not harboring this genetic aberration, activates NG2 / CSPG4 gene transcription and surface display of the PG [unpublished].
evidence: MF4 fusion product into leukemic cells, not harboring this genetic aberration, activates NG2/CSPG4 gene transcription
